questions.question: Considering the overall design, what best describes the style of this athletic shoe?

Based on the image, what appears to be the primary material used for the shoe's upper?
Describe the texture of the burgundy material covering most of the shoe's upper.
What color is the midsole, the visible part of the shoe between the sole and upper?
What is the apparent shape or style of the shoe's toe box, as shown in the image?
Describe the lacing system visible on the shoe, in terms of its visual appearance.
What color is the material of the shoe's heel counter, visible at the back of the shoe?

Based on the image, does the shoe show any visible branding or logos?
What is the apparent level of cushioning indicated by the visible parts of the sole?
